data.name: SMSOK
data.value: Thank you for having verified the authenticity of your {0}! Do not forget you can verify the authenticity of your {0} in an easy and automatic way by enabling an Internet connection on the {0} server pc.

data.name: SMSPageTitle
data.value: Authenticity validation of your {0} by SMS

data.name: SMSPageBtnRegisterText
data.value: Validate

data.name: LblRemark1
data.value: Cannot send the SMS from the registered mobile number?

data.name: LblInfo3
data.value: For the cost of the sent SMS please consult your plan.

data.name: LblError1
data.value: Unfortunately, you cannot proceed with the validation of your {0} by SMS. The validation process has to be necessarily completed by activating an Internet connection on the {0} server pc.

data.name: LblError2
data.value: Starting from the next request, you will be able to fulfil the authenticity validation of your {0} by using the SMS service: please verify whether you have activated the service by consulting the {1} website.

data.name: LblInsertAndClick
data.value: You will receive a code, copy it below and press Validate.

data.name: PingFailed1First
data.value: The FIRST automatic validation attempt of {0} has failed!

data.name: PingFailed1Second
data.value: The NEXT TO LAST automatic validation attempt of {0} has failed!

data.name: PingFailed1Last
data.value: The LAST automatic validation attempt of {0} has failed!

data.name: PingFailed2
data.value: The authenticity of {0} needs to be verified periodically in order to ensure its complete and safe functioning.

data.name: PingFailed3
data.value: An active Internet connection on the {0} server is sufficient to automatically validate your {0}.

data.name: PingFailed4
data.value: The validation service by SMS can be used instead:

data.name: PingFailed5
data.value: CLICK HERE

data.name: PingFailed6
data.value: to gain access now.

data.name: PingFailed7
data.value: Copy and send this message to the IT responsible of your Company.

data.name: PingFailed8
data.value: The {0} software soon will no longer be available should the authenticity verification not take place!

data.name: PingFailed9
data.value: Should the application be blocked-up, it is necessary to validate exclusively by Internet from the pull-down menu "Validation" and selecting the "Validate via Internet" voice, or by opening the Administration Console and performing the authenticity validation.

data.name: LblSMSNotNeeded
data.value: The product is correctly activated! Validation via SMS is not needed.

data.name: LblSMSNotReceived1
data.value: Not yet received the response?

data.name: ValidationOK
data.value: Your {0} management software has been successfully validated!

data.name: ValidationOKInfo
data.value: The authenticity validation provides reassurance on the fact you are utilising an original product software. In order to perform the periodical validation automatically, simply enable an Internet connection on the {0} server pc.

data.name: SendSmsInfo1
data.value: Send, from your registered mobile number, the following code to {0}. Please preserve the spaces!

data.name: ServiceAvaiability
data.value: Services available after registration on the Microarea web site.

data.name: Example
data.value: Example: {0}

data.name: LblReceivedError1
data.value: Get a response with an error?

data.name: LblReceivedError2
data.value: Did you register your mobile number on Microarea web site? Did you send the SMS from the registered mobile number? Did you write the SMS correctly?

data.name: LblRemark2
data.value: Simply add the registered number (with international prefix) at the end of the SMS.

data.name: LblSMSNotReceived2
data.value: Repeat the procedure. Make sure you enter correctly the code, preserving the spaces in the text, and verify the phone number.

data.name: LblSMSNotReceived3
data.value: After at least three times that you didn't get any response, try to send the same text to this number {0} and then send send us an email , reporting the error and providing details to {1}

data.name: LblSMSNotReceived3Title
data.value: Still do not receive any answer anyway?

data.name: Notes
data.value: FAQs

data.name: SMSInfoVatNumber1
data.value: Not yet registered?

data.name: SMSInfoVatNumber2
data.value: Simply add your Vat Number at the end of the SMS. This is possible for a limited number of times, register your mobile number as soon as possible.
